dict.string: LockWhisper needs access to your camera so you can take photos and videos and securely store them in your private, encrypted file vault within the app.
LockWhisper needs access to your microphone so you can record videos with sound and securely store them in your private, encrypted file vault within the app.
LockWhisper needs access to your photo library so you can import photos and videos to securely store them in your private, encrypted file vault within the app.
